nls.description: Total working days between base start and base finish(Legacy)
nls.name: Base Duration(Legacy)

nls.description: True if the tentative schedule should have all successor tasks and assignments auto shifted when a parent task date is changed
nls.name: Auto Shift Successors

nls.description: The Task ID within the sub project this proxy task represents
nls.name: Sub Project Task ID

nls.description: The Project ID this proxy task represents
nls.name: Sub Project ID

nls.description: Original Late finish date of this task
nls.name: Late Finish (Original)

nls.description: Original Late start date of this task
nls.name: Late Start (Original)

nls.description: Original Early finish date of this task
nls.name: Early Finish (Original)

nls.description: Original Early start date of this task
nls.name: Early Start (Original)

nls.description: The ID of the tentative schedule for this task
nls.name: Tentative Schedule ID

nls.description: Task is open for time entry (Used in Timesheet Add Work page)
nls.name: Open for Time Entry (FLS Safe)

nls.description: Prevents Users From Adding to their Timesheet the Project Tasks to which they are not Assigned
nls.name: Prevent Unassigned Timesheet Tasks

nls.description: The Task Name for the direct parent of the Task within the Work Breakdown Structure (WBS)
nls.name: Parent Name

nls.description: The Task ID for the direct parent of the Task within the Work Breakdown Structure (WBS)
nls.name: Parent ID

nls.description: Determines if the task is assigned to Resource mentioned in Object Filter
nls.name: Is Task Assigned to Resource

nls.description: Indicates if the task is part of one-way integration with Microsoft Project
nls.name: Microsoft Project One Way Task

nls.description: Total completed To Dos for this task
nls.name: Completed To Dos

nls.description: The sequence of the card associated with this task
nls.name: Card sequence

nls.description: The board lane id of the card associated with this task
nls.name: Board Lane Id

nls.description: Total uncompleted todos for the task
nls.name: Total uncompleted todos for the task

nls.description: Pre-filter task to those with the assigned resources
nls.name: Assigned To (Aggregation)

nls.description: Is the task's baseline duration fixed(Legacy)
nls.name: Base Fixed Duration(Legacy)

nls.description: Base start date of this task(Legacy)
nls.name: Base Start(Legacy)

nls.description: Base finish date of this task(Legacy)
nls.name: Base Finish(Legacy)
